description: This file is a frontend HTML document implementing a database visualizer interface. It includes HTML structure, CSS styling, and JavaScript code to load databases, tables, and display data with interactive features such as expanding cells and refreshing content.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases from the server and populates the sidebar with database items.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by re-fetching data from server and updating UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles user interaction to expand/collapse database's tables, triggering table load if needed.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches list of tables for a specific database and renders clickable table items.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data from a specific table and displays it in a paginated, scrollable table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Builds and injects HTML table from data array for display.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Determines cell content rendering for different data types, implements expansion for long content and objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a table cell to show full content, handling objects and long strings.
